messages.subject: A Neopets Reminder
messages.msgSnippet: This is fairly off topic, and I m sorry, but for those playing Neopets, this is the week in which five game scores can be sent per day rather than just three.
messages.messageBody:
This is fairly off topic, and I'm sorry, but for those playing
Neopets, this is the week in which five game scores can be sent per
day rather than just three. If anyone's having an antsy week or
looking for something soothing to do, there's a possibility. If you
only play Neopets occasionally, this might be a good occasion.

And in December (I won't remind people again then, in order to keep
my off-topic posts only semi-annual or so), there's an advent-
calendar prize every day.

http://www.neopets.com/winter/adventcalendar.phtml

The art there is often very cute, so even if your kids are too young
to play the games they might like the "prizes" and the animations.

Sandra
